greeting: Hi! I'm your AI Voice Assistant. How can I help you with buying, selling, or valuing accounting practices today?

how long does it take to sell a practice.answer: Our average time to sell is less than 6 months, typically closer to 2-3 months. We have at least 10 qualified buyers for every practice. Would you like to hear from one of our sellers about their quick sale experience?

how long does it take to buy a practice.answer: Our average time is less than 6 months, and more like 2 months. Would you like to hear from one of our clients about their experience?

what is my practice worth.answer: Most practices sell between 100 to 150% of gross annual billing. The exact multiple depends on your profit margins, client mix, and location. Higher profit margins get higher multiples. Would you like to hear how we helped a seller get top dollar for their practice?

how much does it cost to buy a practice.answer: Most practices sell between 100 to 150% of gross annual billing, with most occurring in the 125% range. The exact price depends on profitability, client mix, and location. Would you like to hear how one of our clients found the perfect practice in their budget?

what financing is available.answer: We have a financing source that can finance up to 90% of the purchase price. You typically need good credit, reasonable net worth, and cash flow to support debt service. Would you like to hear from a client who successfully used our financing?

are there guarantees.answer: Yes! Most sales include a one-year guarantee. If collected fees don't equal the amount you purchased, you get a refund based on the exact same multiple. Would you like to hear from a client about how this guarantee gave them confidence?

what do you do.answer: We specialize in buying and selling accounting practices, plus practice valuations. We've been helping CPAs for years with confidential, professional transactions.

selling_speed.intro: Listen to Sarah describe how fast we sold her practice:
selling_speed.fallback_text: One of our sellers, Sarah, was amazed when we sold her practice in just 6 weeks with multiple offers above asking price.

buying_speed.intro: Here's what John had to say about how quickly we found him the perfect practice:
buying_speed.fallback_text: John was thrilled when we found him three qualified practices to choose from within 30 days of starting his search.

selling_value.intro: Listen to how we got Lisa top dollar for her practice:
selling_value.fallback_text: Lisa was surprised when we got her 140% of gross billing - 15% more than she expected.

closing_questions: Would you like to schedule a free consultation to discuss your specific situation?
Is there anything else about buying or selling practices I can help you with?
Would you like me to have Bruce call you to discuss your options personally?
Do you have any other questions about our services?
fallback_response: I don't have a specific answer for that question, but Bruce would be happy to help you personally. What's the best number to reach you at?
